attributes.additional_details:
Some illegal immigrants  are  charged  extortionate amounts of   money  by people who claim to be able  to transport them to the UK.

The illegal immigrants  are sometimes  treated  as "slave labour"

Surely  it would be a better option  for the UK government   to  introduce an  advertising campaign in Vietnam   to  warn potential illegal immigrants not  to pay  large amounts of money  for transport to the UK.

Prevention is better than cure, surely?

How much is it costing for these vans  to cruise around London  all day  advising illegal immigrants to go home?

Much better to send those vans to Vietnam.
